name: Half-Life
description: Installs from the original CD-ROM without the need for the Steam client.  To my knowledge, this is the only way to run Half-Life on Linux legally without the Steam client.
content:
game:
  arch: win32
  args: --some-args
  exe: $GAMEDIR/mygame
  files:
  - installer: N/A:Select the game's setup file
  installer:
  - arch: win64
    executable: installer
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
    task: null
  prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
  system:
    env:
      SOMEENV: true
      WINEDLLOVERRIDES: d3d11=
    terminal: true
  wine:
    Desktop: true
    WineDesktop: 1024x768
    overrides:
      ddraw.dll: n
  working_dir: $GAMEDIR/prefix
